START: ^“Mayor, Mayor! We have a really big problem down in the sewers! There’s some sort of creature slime creature living down there. What should we do?”
Drawn: ^“Mayor we tried pouring a bunch of water down there but it didn’t seem to do anything. I think we just have to board it up for now.”
Troops: ^“Mayor the soldiers you sent in killed it but they ended up smelling pretty bad and need to go wash up out of town.”
Face: ^“Mayor I can’t believe you managed to fight that thing 1 on 1! That’s very impressive but you do stink so please go wash up.”
